entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
